content: ripples make waves hat materials 1 skein of dk weight yarn shown in emma s yarn simply spectacular dk 75/25 superwash merino/nylon 255 yds/100 g in forget me not hat should take no more than 225 yards of dk even in largest size us 6/4 0 mm 16 /40 cm circular knitting needle and one set of needles of the same size for your preferred method of small circumference knitting for the crown of the hat such as dpns a 32 /80 cm circular needle for magic loop etc 1 stitch marker tapestry needle for weaving in ends gauge 22 sts = 4 /10 cm in stockinette stitch in the round after blocking adjust 2-4 /5-10 cm negative ease i was out of town on a teaching trip when i designed this hence the photo from the hotel room but i wanted to get it out as soon as i could so we could knit it and support our fellow humans in ukraine ripples make waves hat © 2022 casapinka and sharon from security jeez page | 1 pattern notes donations although the hat is free if you are able please consider donating to a cause that is helping the people of ukraine even the normal price of a hat pattern $6 would be very helpful if everyone who made one donated also check with your employer to see if they are matching donations many are here are a few suggestions from well-vetted charities world central kitchen www wck org center for disaster philanthropy www disasterphilanthropy org www globalgiving org ukraine crisis relief fund instructions are provided for the smallest size first additional sizes are provided in parentheses where needed dashes are place holders to ensure that the instructions in the parentheses keep their position throughout ripples make waves was designed this past week when i was teaching out of town and happened to have this beautiful blue yarn with me if you know sharon from
